about_the_game:
Over 150 different Classic Card Games

If you like solitaire, you're going to love this Classic Card Game Collection with over 150 different games, including popular classics such as Klondike, Spider, Freecell, Pyramid and many more, hours of enjoyment await you within this collection.

Learn Lots of New Games

Marvel at this collection and enjoy playing all your favorite solitaire card games and discover new ones you've never seen before with rules to help you learn every single game.

Play for Fun and Show off Your Skills

Complete games and work your way to earning 3 stars in every game to show off your skills.

Choose Your Style

Customize the look of your game to suit you with a wide range of card designs, card backs, backgrounds and even win animations.

Features of Classic Card Games Collection

  • Play 150+ different popular and original playing card games in a snap

  • Rules provided for each individual card game

  • Customization of appearance with hd backgrounds and cards

  • Smooth Functionality

  • Unlimited undo and redo

Most Popular Solitaire Games Include

Addiction, Agnes Bernauer, Ali Baba, Algerian, Alaska, Alternation, American Toad, Arizona, Australian Patience, Baker's Dozen, Beehive, Big Harp, Blind Alleys, Block Ten, Blackjack 21s, Canfield, Castle, Chameleon, Cheops, Chessboard, Crescent, Cribbage, Demon Thieves, Eagle Wing, Easthaven, Eight Off, Elevens, Faerie Queen, Fall Star, Fan, Follow The King, Forty Thieves, FreeCell, Gaps, German Patience, Golf, Grand Clock, Heads and Tails, King's Corner, Klondike, Labyrinth, Pyramid, Scorpion, Seven Devils, Spider, Trefoil, Tri Peaks, Virginia Reel, Wasp, Yukon and so many more

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit / Windows 10 64 bit / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or AMD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit / Windows 10 64 bit / Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or AMD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Play over 150 different solitaire card games, including popular classics such as Klondike, Spider, Freecell, Pyramid and many more. Enjoy playing your favorite games and learn new ones with rules provided for every game. Customizable backgrounds, card designs and win animations.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Swedish*
*languages with full audio support
